sentences.english: This politician has done a lot of shameful things.
sentences.chinese: 這個政客做了很多見不得人的事。

sentences.english: Politicians are reluctant to cut taxes, but they do it gradually.
sentences.chinese: 政客們雖不願削減稅費，但還是逐漸地那麼做了。

sentences.english: Do you think that politician is on the up-and-up?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得那位政客的所作所爲是否光明磊落？

sentences.english: The politician was touted as a friend of people.
sentences.chinese: 這個政客被吹捧爲人民之友。

sentences.english: You can see with half an eye that there is a difference between a politician and a statesman.
sentences.chinese: 你可一望而知，政客與政治家是有不同之處。

sentences.english: There has been a great deal of politician's cant .
sentences.chinese: 說了一大堆政客慣用的言不由衷的話。
他滑稽地模仿那個政客的舉止。

sentences.english: Those politicians are jockeying for power.
sentences.chinese: 那些政客們正在相互排擠以爭奪權力。

sentences.english: The politician is in the limelight showing off.
sentences.chinese: 這位政客是個在衆人面前愛出風頭的人。

sentences.english: Some people are under the misapprehension that all politicians stink.
sentences.chinese: 有些人誤會所有的政客都可疑。

sentences.english: In some countries, disgraced politicians kill them-selves.
sentences.chinese: 在有些國家，丟了臉的政客會自殺。

sentences.english: In short, he is a technocrat.
sentences.chinese: 總之，他是一個專業的政客。

sentences.english: The citizens have provided favors and help to these politicos time and again.
sentences.chinese: 公民們提供支持和幫助這些政客的時間和一次。

sentences.english: We expect politicians to defame each other in an election year.
sentences.chinese: 我們預料政客們在選舉年會互相誹謗。

sentences.english: Some selfish Chinese politicians are considered to be "typhoid Marys " to their own people.
sentences.chinese: 一些自私自利的中國政客，是自己同胞禍害的根源。

sentences.english: Anyone who wants to be a politician is already dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 想要成爲政客的任何人都是不清正廉明的。
